points at Reset."},{"lineNumber":86711,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わたしのおとーさん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's my daddy!\""},{"lineNumber":86712,"originalJapaneseLine":"ビシッとランスを指さし。","translatedEnglishLine":"She sharply points at the rubber ducks!?\""},{"lineNumber":86724,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい、万全です！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes, everything's it's tough."},{"lineNumber":86728,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よいしょ、よいしょ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Heave-ho, heave-ho.\""},{"lineNumber":86729,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それが終わったらマッサージだー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"After that, a the bath, we play!"},{"lineNumber":86734,"originalJapaneseLine":"　缶蹴りだ！　鬼はシィーーーール！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kick the can! The tagger is Seal!\""},{"lineNumber":86735,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい、頑張りますー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes, I'll do my best!\""},{"lineNumber":86736,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わーい、シィルちゃんだー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yay, it's Seal-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":86737,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あてなが最強れすー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Atena is the strongest!\""},{"lineNumber":86738,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いっぱいあそぼーねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's play a lot!\""},{"lineNumber":86739,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah!\""},{"lineNumber":86740,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええっ、どなた！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh!? Who's that!?\""},{"lineNumber":86741,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そーれ、スタート！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, start!"},{"lineNumber":86742,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がははは、みんな逃げろー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahaha, everyone run away!\""},{"lineNumber":86743,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaa!\""},{"lineNumber":86744,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、待って下さい、名前、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, wait please, names,"},{"lineNumber":86745,"originalJapaneseLine":"　名前が分からないと私勝てないですー」","translatedEnglishLine":"If I don't know the names, I can't win.\""},{"lineNumber":86746,"originalJapaneseLine":"「遊び終わったら、また飯だー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"After playing, it's meal time again!\""},{"lineNumber":86747,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シィーーーーール！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Seal!\""},{"lineNumber":86748,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、晩ご飯は何にしますか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, what shall we have for dinner?\""},{"lineNumber":86749,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um...\""},{"lineNumber":86750,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へんでろぱ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Henderopa?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ？　その辺、どうなってたっけ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What was going on around here again?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うるさい！　いいから、飯だ飯！」
随分久しぶりの気がするぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like it's been quite a long time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おかわり沢山ありますからね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s plenty of seconds, you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うふふ、可愛らしいお嬢さんね。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Would you like to eat too?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、じゃあちょっと待っててね。
あのランス様、こちらのお子さんは？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, who is this child here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピッとリセット指さし。
ビシッとランスを指さし。
フェリスさんや五十六様以外とも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides Miss Felis and Lord Isoroku,
you still have children with others...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だー、さっきからやかましい奴め！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez, you've been noisy since a while ago!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飯の後は風呂だ、風呂ー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After the meal, it's bath time, bath!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アヒルちゃんはいるかー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do we have the rubber ducks!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大っきな背中なので大変です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a big back, so it's tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが終わったらマッサージだー！」
わ、凝ってますね、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wow, you're really tense, Lord Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 缶蹴りだ！　鬼はシィーーーール！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kick the can! The tagger is Seal!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、みんな逃げろー！」
名前が分からないと私勝てないですー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I don't know the names, I can't win."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「遊び終わったら、また飯だー！
「はい、晩ご飯は何にしますか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, what shall we have for dinner?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
